The user requested to add a new navigation item labeled "About," specifying that it should be red. The AI confirmed this addition. Subsequently, the user was presented with a list of additional features to consider implementing, including adding a "Contact Us" nav item and a language toggle, among others. Upon the user's input, the AI was instructed to make all tab names one-word equivalents of their current versions. In response, the AI sought further clarification on the project details for better understanding. During the conversation, the user was also asked about their preferences regarding tab naming—whether to use synonyms of current names or abstract concepts, and whether to maintain or shift the tonality of the names. The AI acknowledged these queries and stated it would work on renaming all tabs accordingly.
